name: Tell the Tale
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You take on the role of a fairy tale protagonist, convincing reality itself to favor you. You automatically succeed all ability checks for the duration.

If the spell is ended early by losing your concentration through taking damage, the karmic debt incurred by tricking reality immediately becomes due. You have disadvantage on all rolls for the remainder of the normal duration, and can't take a break or rest during this time.
